feed.title: FORM Consulting
feed.subtitle: Shorter description of FORM Consulting needed here.

entry.title: Victoria Arnold
entry.content: Hey guys! My name is Victoria Arnold and I am a second-year student at Penn State’s Schreyer Honors College. I am from Quakertown, PA and am majoring in economics, finance, and security & risk analysis. I joined F.O.R.M. in order to help students navigate the ever-changing college admissions process, hopefully helping in this difficult and confusing time to make their lives much easier. As Treasurer, I maintain any and all financial records and proceedings of the organization, as well as managing donations and gifts.

entry.title: Olivia Pierce
entry.content: Hi, everyone! My name is Olivia Pierce and I am a sophomore in the Schreyer Honors College. I’m majoring in English and Secondary English Education with minors in Theatre and Special Education! I’m from Williamsport, Pennsylvania (A.K.A. the home of the Little League World Series), and I attended a small private Catholic school all my life. Within F.O.R.M., I act as Partnership Director - this pretty much means that I reach out to high schools to organize special events and create interest in our club, along with recruiting prospective new members and pursuing partnerships with high schools, financial sponsors, and academic institutions.!

entry.title: Morgan Phillips
entry.content: Hello! I'm Morgan Philips, and I'm a first-year student majoring in Secondary Education in the Social Sciences with a minor in History. I grew up in a rural town called Holyoke, CO. Along with F.O.R.M Consulting, I am involved in Mock Trial and Eco-Reps. When I was approached about F.O.R.M. Consulting, I was excited to share my knowledge of the college application process with high school students.

entry.title: Mary Lawrence
entry.content: I am a senior studying Sociology and Criminology. I will graduate in May 2018 and go to law school in August. In my free time I am a server at a restaurant in downtown State College.

entry.title: Jake Springer
entry.content: I'm a Secondary Education and Classics & Ancient Mediterranean Studies double major. I'm involved in student government, the alumni association, and F.O.R.M. I love the idea of helping out underserved communities and getting successful students to points that they can benefit them for their entire life.

entry.title: Isabelle Stull
entry.content:
Isabelle Stull - Internal Director

Email: ims8@psu.edu

Hi! I’m Isabelle Stull and I’m sophomore in Penn State’s Schreyer Honors College, currently pursuing a Premedicine and Psychology double major. I’m from a small town called Bernville which is located right outside of Reading, PA! I’m the Internal Director for FORM which means I manage and organize all of the different resources we have available for the students we help.

entry.title: Em Evans
entry.content: Hi! My name is Em Evans. I’m a freshman Schreyer Scholar majoring in Mechanical Engineering and Spanish. Outside of class, I’m a F.O.R.M. consultant, undergraduate researcher in the Human Systems Design Lab, and a member of the Spanish club. After graduation, I hope to go to graduate school to pursue a Ph.D. and do engineering research. I became a consultant because I love to write, and if I can use that skill to help students in anyway, I will!

entry.title: Dante Marcucci
entry.content: Hi! I am Dante Marcucci, and I am a freshman Math/German double major with a statistics minor from Pittsburgh, PA. FORM appealed to me, because I put in a ton of time towards my college application and scholarship processes, and I want to share the knowledge that I gained with others. I look forward to helping you in the application process and easing any concerns that you may have about college.

entry.title: Daniel Zahn
entry.content: Hello! I’m Daniel Zahn, and I am a second-year student pursuing majors in English, Philosophy, and Communication Arts & Sciences with minors in History, French, and Linguistics. I’m from Allentown, PA--made famous by the Billy Joel song and by hiding the Liberty Bell during the Revolutionary War. When Cory Steinle approached me about an idea that would turn into F.O.R.M. Consulting, I was eager to jump on-board, help co-found the organization, and serve as its Vice President. As Vice President, I develop and oversee any legal proceedings of the organization, as well as serving as President when they are unable to.

entry.title: Cassandra Motyka
entry.content: Hi everyone! My name is Cassandra Motyka, and I’m a freshman here at Penn State in the Schreyer Honors College. I’m majoring in Security and Risk Analysis, and I am pursuing minors in Spanish and Global Security. One day I hope to work for the World Health Organization and track the movement of viruses and diseases and help stop their spread. I joined F.O.R.M. consultants because I wanted to help students like me that went to large high schools have more one-on-one support when applying to colleges. Here at Penn State outside of F.O.R.M., I am the captain of a Mock Trial team and the secretary of College Independents. I am excited to work with everyone and see all of the great things our organization and the mentees can accomplish!
